name: Escape If You Can 5 (Room challenge games)
name_original: Escape If You Can 5 (Room challenge games)
description:
Are you ready for the most uncommon room escape game you have every played?

After some thrilling. Detective Ale successfully escaped from the arrest of the police. Drive all the way to the west.
Unexpectedly. The tyres was punctured by a row of nails in the center of the road and the car broke down. There was no signs of human habitation but an abandoned school nearby. It seems Detective Ale can only go inside the school for something ......

Magnificent puzzles,Stunning story
Beautifully rendered backgrounds that will pull you in and never let you go!
Beautiful soundtrack perfectly suited to this eerie and haunting world.
Auto-save feature , never lose your progress again.
